author: jochembrouwer
content: Thanks! If the total diff is the same, the largest number of txns is then the head block? (Very weird here BTW, because in that case if you as miner would explicitly want to claim the block if there are no transactions around to get some fees from, you could just fill the block with random self-signed transactions in order to fill the transactions list)
